trans-unit.source: Verifies an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSA"></xref> PKCS #1 version 1.5 signature.
trans-unit.target: Verifica uma <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSA"> </xref> assinatura de versão 1.5 PKCS n. º 1.

trans-unit.source: This class is used to verify a digital signature made with the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA> algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe é utilizada para verificar uma assinatura digital efetuada com os <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA>algoritmo.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA>

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureFormatter> to create digital signatures with the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA> algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Utilize <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureFormatter>Criar assinaturas digitais com o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA>algoritmo.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureFormatter>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter.SetKey%2A> and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter.SetHashAlgorithm%2A> to set the key and hash algorithm before calling <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter.VerifySignature%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Utilizar <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter.SetKey%2A>e <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter.SetHashAlgorithm%2A>para definir o algoritmo de chave e hash antes de chamar <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter.VerifySignature%2A>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter.VerifySignature%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter.SetHashAlgorithm%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter.SetKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter"></xref> class with the specified key.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter"> </xref> classe com a chave especificada.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter.SetHashAlgorithm%2A> to set the hash algorithm before calling <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter.VerifySignature%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Utilize <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter.SetHashAlgorithm%2A>para definir o algoritmo de hash antes de chamar <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter.VerifySignature%2A>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter.VerifySignature%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter.SetHashAlgorithm%2A>

trans-unit.source: The instance of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSA"></xref> that holds the public key.
trans-unit.target: A instância do <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSA"> </xref> que contém a chave pública.

trans-unit.source: key is .
trans-unit.target: key is .

trans-unit.source: Sets the hash algorithm to use for verifying the signature.
trans-unit.target: Define o algoritmo de hash a utilizar para verificar a assinatura.

trans-unit.source: You must set a hash algorithm before calling <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter.VerifySignature%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Tem de definir um algoritmo de hash antes de chamar <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter.VerifySignature%2A>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter.VerifySignature%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the hash algorithm to use for verifying the signature.
trans-unit.target: O nome do algoritmo hash a utilizar para verificar a assinatura.

trans-unit.source: Sets the public key to use for verifying the signature.
trans-unit.target: Define a chave pública a utilizar para verificar a assinatura.

trans-unit.source: You must set a key before calling <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter.VerifySignature%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Tem de definir uma chave antes de chamar <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter.VerifySignature%2A>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSAPKCS1SignatureDeformatter.VerifySignature%2A>

trans-unit.source: The instance of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSA"></xref> that holds the public key.
trans-unit.target: A instância do <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSA"> </xref> que contém a chave pública.

trans-unit.source: key is .
trans-unit.target: key is .

trans-unit.source: Verifies the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSA"></xref> PKCS#1 signature for the specified data.
trans-unit.target: Verifica o <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSA"> </xref> PKCS n. º&1; assinatura para os dados especificados.

trans-unit.source: You must specify a key and a hash algorithm before calling this method.
trans-unit.target: Tem de especificar uma chave e um algoritmo hash antes de chamar este método.

trans-unit.source: The data signed with `rgbSignature`.
trans-unit.target: Os dados assinados com `rgbSignature`.

trans-unit.source: The signature to be verified for `rgbHash`.
trans-unit.target: A assinatura a ser verificado `rgbHash`.

trans-unit.source: if rgbSignature matches the signature computed using the specified hash algorithm and key on rgbHash; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Se rgbSignature corresponde à assinatura calculada utilizando o algoritmo hash especificado e a chave no rgbHash ; caso contrário, .

trans-unit.source: The key is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The key is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: -or- The hash algorithm is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: - ou - o algoritmo de hash é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The rgbHash parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The rgbHash parameter is .

trans-unit.target: -or- The rgbSignature parameter is .
